title: Heart of Darkness: How I Triumphed Over a Childhood of Abuse
description: Lynette Gould tells the shocking story of her life that includes multiple incest, multiple rapes, and being lured into a child-sex ring. Her story is horrifying and desperately sad, and in her own moving words, she speaks of her battle with the past and of those responsible for the evil which ruined it. But her life was pulled back from the brink of oblivion by the patient dedication and enduring friendship of a child counselor, out of which salvation tentatively sprang.
author: Lynette Gould
